_meanings:
{@--1@} To rush upon
(as a wild beast on its prey), to
burst or break in upon; {#vfkavaccAvaluMpeta#}.
{@--2@} To eat, devour, swallow (<ab>fig.</ab>
also); {#anyonyasyAvaluMpaMti sArameyA#}
{#yaTAmizaM#} <ls>Mb.</ls>; {#sarvamevAvaluMpati#} <ls>H. 2. 99</ls>;
{#avalupyamAna iva vfzwipAtEH#} <ls>K. 93</ls>, <ls n="K.">109.</ls> 

{@--3@} To suppress, crush, keep down,
stifle; {#rakzatyavaluMpate ca yaH#} <ls>BhƒÅg.</ls>;  
{#jarAvaluptamAnAvamAnaciMtaH#} having lost all
sense of &c.
